QuestData.Title: Blowing of the Horn
QuestData.Description:
Why would they have brought Ohn'ahra here? Unless...
$n! I do not think Balakar intends to destroy the Horn. I think this is a trap! We must find a way past this wind, quickly!
QuestData.RewardText:
I will not rest until Balakar answers for the crimes he committed here today. The slaughter of my people, the blasphemy against Ohn'ahra, the treachery against our ancient ally....
Vengeance will have to wait. There are more pressing matters. We must help the green dragons.
